text: Fall into Darkness is a 1996 American television thriller movie directed by Mark Sobel and was based on the novel of the same name by Christopher Pike. It stars Tatyana Ali, Charlotte Ross, Jonathan Brandis, Paul Scherrer, Sean Murray and aired on NBC. ==Other websites== * Category:1996 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Television movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Fall into Darkness
